results.name: A Jacobsthal convolution.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,4,4).
formula: a(n) = sum(A128099(n, n-2*k), k=0..floor(n/2)). - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 28 2013
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 08 2005
